skills.name: LIGHTBRINGER
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Decrease Max HP of the enemy by 10% each attack.
• 50% Chance to Lower DEF for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: BLAZING EYES
desc: • Deals physical damage to all enemies.
• Increase ATK of all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: COUNTER
desc: 50% Chance to counter attack the opponent that attacked you.
